summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5065 for the improvement of West 75th Street, from 28th Avenue Northwest to 32nd Avenue Northwest; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by grading and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 58193 as amended in Section 4 by Ordinance No. 58335, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
